Welcome to my personal website! I'm Neil and I'm building safe AI systems designed to work with and for humans. 

I recently completed my DPhil (PhD) in Computer Science at the [University of Oxford](https://www.ox.ac.uk/)'s [Human Centred Computing](https://hcc.cs.ox.ac.uk/) theme, advised by [Reuben Binns](https://www.reubenbinns.com/) and [Sir Nigel Shadbolt](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigel_Shadbolt). My research focuses on Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence, Explainable AI (XAI), algorithmic fairness, and designing AI decision-support systems for recruitment and mental health.

I'm currently an Advisor at the Autoscience Institute, and previously served as an AI Research Scientist there. Before that, I was an AI Research Consultant at the [Ellison Institute of Technology](https://eit.org/) and with [Schmidt Futures](https://www.schmidtfutures.com/)' [Rise](https://www.risefortheworld.org/) program.

In my free time, I read books; climb rocks; and play badminton and pickleball.

## Highlights

```{=html}
<div id="carouselContainer" class="my-4"></div>
<style>
  /* Thumbnails with hover overlay */
  #carouselContainer .thumb { position: relative; overflow: hidden; border-radius: .75rem; }
  #carouselContainer .thumb img { display: block; width: 100%; height: 180px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: .75rem; }
  #carouselContainer .thumb .thumb-overlay { position: absolute; inset: 0; display: flex; align-items: end; padding: .75rem; color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,0); opacity: 0; transition: opacity .2s ease, background .2s ease; }
  #carouselContainer .thumb:hover .thumb-overlay { opacity: 1; background: rgba(0,0,0,.45); }
  #carouselContainer .thumb-title { margin: .5rem 0 0; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 600; }
  #carouselContainer .overlay-text { margin: 0; font-size: .875rem; }
  #carouselContainer .thumb-row { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); gap: 1rem; align-items: stretch; }
</style>
<script>
fetch('assets/carousel.json')
  .then(response => response.json())
  .then(data => {
    const items = Array.isArray(data.items) ? data.items : [];
    if (items.length === 0) return;

    const carouselId = 'highlightsCarousel';

    const groups = [];
    for (let i = 0; i < items.length; i += 3) {
      groups.push(items.slice(i, i + 3));
    }

    const indicatorsHtml = groups.map((_, index) => {
      const activeAttrs = index === 0 ? 'class="active" aria-current="true"' : '';
      return `<button type="button" data-bs-target="#${carouselId}" data-bs-slide-to="${index}" ${activeAttrs} aria-label="Slide ${index + 1}"></button>`;
    }).join('');

    const slidesHtml = groups.map((group, groupIndex) => {
      const isActive = groupIndex === 0 ? ' active' : '';

      const cardsHtml = group.map((item) => {
        const imageSrc = item.image || '';
        const imageAlt = item.alt || '';
        const titleHtml = item.title ? `<p class="thumb-title">${item.title}</p>` : '';
        const textHtml = item.text ? `<p class="overlay-text">${item.text}</p>` : '';

        const thumbInner = `
          <div class="thumb">
            <img src="${imageSrc}" alt="${imageAlt}">
            <div class="thumb-overlay">
              ${textHtml}
            </div>
            ${item.link ? `<a href="${item.link}" class="stretched-link" aria-label="${item.title || 'Open'}"></a>` : ''}
          </div>`;

        return `
          <div>
            ${thumbInner}
            ${titleHtml}
          </div>`;
      }).join('');

      return `
        <div class="carousel-item${isActive}">
          <div class="thumb-row">
            ${cardsHtml}
          </div>
        </div>`;
    }).join('');

    const baseInterval = items[0] && items[0].interval ? items[0].interval : 5000;

    const carouselHtml = `
      <div id="${carouselId}" class="carousel slide" data-bs-ride="carousel" data-bs-interval="${baseInterval}">
        <div class="carousel-inner">
          ${slidesHtml}
        </div>
        <div class="mt-2 d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
          <div class="carousel-indicators m-0">
            ${indicatorsHtml}
          </div>
          <div class="d-flex gap-2">
            <button class="carousel-control-prev position-static" type="button" data-bs-target="#${carouselId}" data-bs-slide="prev">
              <span class="carousel-control-prev-icon" aria-hidden="true"></span>
              <span class="visually-hidden">Previous</span>
            </button>
            <button class="carousel-control-next position-static" type="button" data-bs-target="#${carouselId}" data-bs-slide="next">
              <span class="carousel-control-next-icon" aria-hidden="true"></span>
              <span class="visually-hidden">Next</span>
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>`;

    const container = document.getElementById('carouselContainer');
    if (container) {
      container.innerHTML = carouselHtml;
    }
  })
  .catch(() => {/* ignore errors rendering carousel */});
</script>

```
